actors: |Steven Strait|Dominique Tipper|Wes Chatham|Cas Anvar|Shohreh Aghdashloo|Thomas Jane|Frankie Adams|Cara Gee|Chad Coleman|Jared Harris|Shawn Doyle|Florence Faivre|Nick E. Tarabay|Terry Chen|Andrew Rotilio|François Chau|David Strathairn|Elizabeth Mitchell|Martin Roach|Burn Gorman|
overview: Two hundred years in the future, in a fully colonized solar system, police detective Josephus Miller is given the assignment to find a missing young woman, Julie Mao. Joining his task is James Holden, former first officer of an ice freighter who is involved in an incident caused by the tense relationship between Earth, Mars and the Belt. Far from their struggles in space, United Nations executive Chrisjen Avasarala works to prevent war between Earth and Mars. Soon the three find out that the missing woman is connected to a vast conspiracy that threatens all humanity.
name: The Expanse

episodes.overview: In the outer solar system near Saturn, James Holden and the crew of the ice freighter Canterbury investigate a distress call from a mysterious derelict ship, the Scopuli. On Ceres Station, Detective Miller begins an off-the-books investigation of a missing heiress, Julie Mao.
episodes.name: Dulcinea

episodes.overview: Holden and crew are trapped in a badly damaged shuttle. On Ceres, Miller uncovers clues about Julie Mao. On Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala questions a terrorist.
episodes.name: The Big Empty

episodes.overview: While Avasarala plays a dangerous game of politics, Holden and his crew begin to turn on one another while held captive by the Martian Navy.
episodes.name: Remember the Cant

episodes.overview: Holden and crew are caught in the middle of a desperate battle, as mysterious warships attack and board the Donnager. As Miller continues to investigate Julie Mao, his partner Havelock continues to go missing.
episodes.name: CQB

episodes.overview: The crew has survived the loss of the Canturbury and the Donnager and are contacted by an unlikely ally. Miller, on Ceres, continues his investigation and his thoughts of a conspiracy grow.
episodes.name: Back to the Butcher

episodes.overview: Holden's team makes an uneasy alliance with Fred Johnson while Miller fights for his life against Anderson Dawes' thugs.
episodes.name: Rock Bottom

episodes.overview: Holden and his crew face a Martian military blockade. Miller finds a new reason to forge ahead. Avasarala visits Holden’s family.
episodes.name: Windmills

episodes.overview: A derelict vessel holds a potentially devastating secret. Holden and his crew cross paths with Miller on Eros. Avasarala receives bad news.
episodes.name: Salvage

episodes.overview: Miller, Holden and his crew are trapped on Eros. Avasarala discovers the origin of the mystery ships.
episodes.name: Critical Mass

episodes.overview: Miller, Holden and his crew fight their way to the Rocinante to escape Eros. On Earth, Avasarala fears for the stability of Earth's government and her family's safety.
episodes.name: Leviathan Wakes

episodes.overview: Unlikely allies Joe Miller and the crew of the Rocinante led by Jim Holden uncover more about the conspiracy to release the protomolecule on Eros station.
episodes.name: Safe

episodes.overview: Holden and Miller butt heads about how the raid was handled.
episodes.name: Static

episodes.overview: With the help of Fred Johnson and the OPA, Miller, Holden and the crew stage a raid for information on the protomolecule; on Earth, Avasarala learns a truth about Fred Johnson.
episodes.name: Doors And Corners

episodes.overview: Miller devises a dangerous plan to eradicate what's left of the protomolecule on Eros.
episodes.name: Godspeed

episodes.overview: The Rocinante chases the asteroid Eros as it hurtles towards Earth.
episodes.name: Home

episodes.overview: Earth and Mars search for answers in the aftermath of the asteroid collision.
episodes.name: Paradigm Shift

episodes.overview: Preparations for the Earth/Mars peace conference tighten the tension on Errinwright.
episodes.name: The Seventh Man

episodes.overview: Naomi tracks down signs of the protomolecule; Fred Johnson's control over the OPA collapses.
episodes.name: Pyre

episodes.overview: Bobbie becomes a political pawn in the struggle between Earth and Mars.
episodes.name: The Weeping Somnambulist

episodes.overview: Holden leads his crew through the war-torn station on Ganymede.
episodes.name: Cascade

episodes.overview: Bobbie makes a decision that changes her life forever.
episodes.name: Here There Be Dragons

episodes.overview: A discovery pushes Naomi and Holden apart and sets the Roci crew against each other.
episodes.name: The Monster and the Rocket

episodes.overview: The Roci crew must fight to save the ship.
episodes.name: Caliban's War

episodes.overview: The Rocinante crew deals with the fallout over Naomi's betrayal while caught in the middle of the war between Earth and Mars. Avasarala and Bobbie hatch an escape plan.
episodes.name: Fight or Flight

episodes.gueststars: |Elizabeth Mitchell|François Chau|Jaeden Noel|Raven Dauda|Ted Atherton|Terry Chen|
episodes.overview: The Rocinante answers an unexpected distress signal. Bobbie and Avasarala find themselves being hunted by a mysterious captor. UN Secretary-General Sorrento-Gillis brings in a colleague from his past to lend an ear during this crucial time of war.
episodes.name: IFF

episodes.gueststars: |Byron Mann|Elizabeth Mitchell|François Chau|Morgan Kelly|Morgan Kelly|Natalie Lisinska|Nick E. Tarabay|Ted Atherton|Terry Chen|
episodes.overview: Earth strategizes a costly ploy to gain advantage in the war against Mars. Anna struggles to convince Sorrento-Gillis to do the right thing. Avasarala and Bobbie seek refuge aboard the Rocinante.
episodes.name: Assured Destruction

episodes.overview: The Rocinante tends to wounded Martian soldiers in exchange for supplies; Avasarala struggles with how to disseminate a key piece of evidence despite being in hiding.
episodes.name: Reload

episodes.overview: The search for Prax's daughter comes to a head; Admiral Souther's men plan for mutiny aboard the Agatha King.
episodes.name: Triple Point

episodes.overview: The final battle between Earth and Mars threatens the very future of humanity. A new monster is unleashed on Prospero Station. Anna receives the smoking gun she needs.
episodes.name: Immolation

episodes.overview: All eyes turn to the edge of the solar system as a mysterious new presence emerges. Naomi recommits to her roots. Drummer butts heads with a seasoned new commander aboard the Behemoth. A young Belter makes a name for himself.
episodes.name: Delta-V

episodes.overview: An old friend taunts Holden with the answers he seeks. Naomi struggles to fit in. A mysterious low-level tech aboard the Thomas Prince enacts a terrifying plan.
episodes.name: It Reaches Out

episodes.overview: The Rocinante seeks a new game plan as they attempt to avoid capture. Melba's true motives are revealed. Naomi is torn between identity and ideal. Anna seeks a way to stay aboard the Thomas Prince.
episodes.name: Intransigence

episodes.overview: Holden sees past, present, and future. A ghost from Melba's past threatens her mission. Bobbie struggles to trust an old friend as she leads a group into uncharted territory.
episodes.name: Dandelion Sky

episodes.overview: Drummer and Ashford find themselves trapped with few options for survival. Anna tends to the wounded masses as Melba continues to hunt down her prey. The Rocinante crew struggles to survive as Naomi reunites with her true family.
episodes.name: Fallen World

episodes.overview: As survivors arrive to the Behemoth, two factions form over how to handle a life-or-death threat. Holden grapples with what he's seen and the choices he must make.
episodes.name: Congregation

episodes.overview: Holden and his allies must stop Ashford and his team from destroying the Ring, and perhaps all of humanity.
episodes.name: Abaddon's Gate

episodes.overview: The crew of the Roci investigates a strange protomolecule ruin on an alien planet. Bobbie copes with civilian life on Mars. Drummer and Ashford battle with piracy in the Belt.
episodes.name: New Terra

episodes.overview: Dominique Tipper hosts questions from Twitter, answered by various cast and crew of The Expanse.
episodes.name: Behind The Scenes: Twitter Segment

episodes.overview: Actress Shohreh Aghdashloo and costume designer Joanne Hansen talk about the wardrobe design of Chrisjen Avasarala in The Expanse.
episodes.name: Behind The Scenes: Avasarala's Closet

episodes.overview: Behind the design of the racing ship Razorback and construction of the complicated cockpit set.
episodes.name: Behind The Scenes: Flight of the Razorback

episodes.overview: David Strathairn and The Expanse production team talk about the evolution the character Klaes Ashford, bringing him from the book to the screen.
episodes.name: Behind The Scenes: Klaes Ashford - Building a Character

episodes.overview: Avasarala is blindsided while on a visit to Mars. The Roci crew continue their protomolecule investigation while tensions between the RCE and Belters reach a tipping point. Drummer and Ashford track down a terrorist.
episodes.name: Jetsam

episodes.overview: New alien threats emerge on Ilus as Naomi battles health challenges on the planet. Bobbie searches for a missing person on Mars. Avasarala faces a new challenge in the UN.
episodes.name: Subduction

episodes.overview: Drummer and Ashford confront a dangerous person from Naomi’s past. Murtry hunts down a target. Bobbie’s makes a life-changing confession.
episodes.name: Retrograde

episodes.overview: As tensions on Ilus reach a boiling point, Holden reveals a secret. Avasarala debates Nancy Gao. An emergency on the Roci forces Alex and Naomi into action.
episodes.name: Oppressor

episodes.overview: The Roci crew prepares for an incoming disaster on Ilus. Ashford and Drummer close in on an enemy within the Belt. Bobbie takes on a dangerous job.
episodes.name: Displacement

episodes.overview: Naomi and Alex work to keep the Barbapiccola in orbit amidst a power outage. Avasarala faces a tough decision. Holden and Elvi race to find a cure for a disease spreading on Ilus.
episodes.name: A Shot in the Dark

episodes.overview: Avasarala faces fallout for the UN’s military mission. Ashford and Drummer makes big decisions about their future within the OPA. A spreading illness on Ilus takes a toll on Amos. Alex and Naomi’s attempt to rescue the Barb turns desperate.
episodes.name: The One-Eyed Man

episodes.overview: Holden and Miller race to save Ilus. Murtry puts his endgame into motion, putting the Roci crew’s lives at risk.
episodes.name: Saeculum

episodes.overview: Ashford closes in on an enemy while uncovering a dangerous plot. Avasarala faces a crossroads in her personal and political life. The Roci crew works to reestablish life on Ilus in the wake of a deadly catastrophe.
episodes.name: Cibola Burn

episodes.overview: Kevin Smith recaps the first three seasons of The Expanse so you can jump right into season four when it’s released Friday, December 13th on Amazon Prime Video. A show known for its visual effects, Kevin assumes he’ll have access to the same high-caliber graphics throughout the recap. He shows off his green screen prowess while summarizing 30 hours of action-packed TV, unaware special effects were never planned to be added.
episodes.name: Kevin Smith Explains The Expanse
